title: Chino Valley Ranchers Organic Eggs Featured in Sweet Potato Toast Recipe
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Chino Valley Ranchers organic eggs were recently featured in an Instagram post by Social Media Influencer Carly Schwartzbach on her profile @everything_but_the_bagel which has over 29,000 followers.

The sweet potato toast recipe calls for Caulipower sea salt, olive oil, sweet potato toasts, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, Majestic Garlic cilantro garlic dip, Majestic Garlic chipotle hummus, Everything But The Bagel seasoning and Trader Joe’s guacamole and pico.

Speaking about the Instagram post, Vice President of Chino Valley Ranchers Chris Nichols says, “I’m always delighted to discover a new way of enjoying organic Chino Valley Ranchers eggs. The sweet potato toast recipe by @everything_but_the_bagel has caught my eye and I’m excited to share it with my family and friends.”

From day one, Chino Valley Ranchers has been committed to producing the freshest and highest quality eggs. Today, Chino Valley Ranchers has ranches across California and Texas, producing a wide variety of eggs, including cage-free, free-range and pasture raised. Each ranch adheres to the values and standards of quality that have made the Chino Valley Ranchers brand a top choice for health conscious consumers. 

On her Instagram profile, Carly Schwartzbach shares niche food products and recipes for bowls, appetizers, toast and more. For the full Instagram post, visit https://www.instagram.com/p/B3z6Y8hgCm-/
